action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks for sending through.

Changes required as follows:


  1. The OmniTAINER Portable Tanks Page:



https://omnitanker.com/products/omnitainer-portable-tanks/



Changes:

1A) Everywhere that I have marked the page with a vertical red line requires a carriage return and a blank line.

1B) Remove carriage unnecessary carriage returns (e.g. top of right hand column). Others may appear when text is reformatted.

1C) The location where I have underlined "Certifications" in blue needs to be moved to the bottom of the page, and reformatted in accordance with the existing text and dot points

1D) The location where I have underlined in green (sentence starting with "Deep Sea dangerous goods") needs to replace the bottom sentence starting with "IMO/IMDG"


  1. The OmniTAINER Swap Tanks Page:


https://omnitanker.com/products/omnitainer-swap-tanks/



Changes:

2A) Everywhere that I have marked the page with a vertical red line requires a carriage return and a blank line.

2B) Remove carriage unnecessary carriage returns (e.g. top of right hand column). Others may appear when text is reformatted.

2C) Delete the final line starting "IMO/IMDG", that I have marked with a strike through.

Best regards,

Luke Djukic















Dr Luke Djukic (PhD, BE, CPEng, FIEAust, NER, APEC Engineer, IntPE(Aus), RPEQ)

Chief Technical Officer

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hello Rica, Can you also make the changes on the Omni Tank Containers site. Please make changes 1, 2A, 2B, 3A and 3B as outlined below.
  1. We would like to update the following page https://omnitanker.com/products/omni-tainer/:
We want this to look as follows (please used attached image "OMNI-44" above the OmniTAINER Swap Tanks):
  1. Change to "Omni TAINER Portable Tanks":
2A. Under "OmniTAINER Portable Tanks" (shown in red box below), add the following text: *** Start Text*** OmniTAINER Portable Tanks are constructed using the patented OmniTANK technology. These are the world's first carbon fibre reinforced portable tank containers, and are suitable for a broad range of chemicals. OmniTAINERs are revolutionising intermodal chemical transport worldwide. *** End Text *** 2B. Under "Read More" (shown in red box below), add the following text: Add the following text: *** Start Text*** The OmniTAINER™ Portable Tank is an intermodal tank container approved for road and rail transport of Dangerous Goods. It is available in a range of volumes, specific to given transport needs. The OmniTAINER™ includes a specially developed fire protection system which has been tested at the BAM Test Site Technical Safety facility in Germany and passes the European ADR and RID full engulfment fire test requirements. OmniTAINER™ is currently approved with a test pressure of 4 bar. The OmniTAINER™ holds CSC and Dynamic Longitudinal Rail Impact Test Approvals. OmniTAINER™ can be supplied as T7 (bottom outlet) and T10 (top discharge) tanks, approved under a 49 CFR Special Permit in USA, and ADG7 in Australia. OmniTAINER™ is ADR and RID approved as L4BH (bottom outlet) and L4DH (top discharge). OmniTAINER™ is suitable for transporting high purity chemicals such as Hydrogen Peroxide and Ammonium Hydroxide without contamination of these cargoes. They are also suitable for transport of aggressive corrosive Class 8 chemicals such as Sodium Hypochlorite, Hydrochloric Acid, Sulphuric Acid, Ferric Chloride, Ferrous Chloride, Hydrofluoric Acid, Hydrofluorosilisic Acid, Nitric Acid, and Phosphoric Acid without degradation of the liner. The OmniTAINER™ contains the highly engineered and patented composite material combination including the OmniSHIELD™, OmniBIND™ and OmniFORT™ product systems. The OmniSHIELD polyethylene interior is specifically designed to provide high chemical resistance to composite tanks and is a revolution in corrosion barrier technology, creating a seamless and low stress polymer interior. The OmniBIND overcomes challenges associated with joining thermoplastics to thermoset composites, providing a strong and durable connection. The OmniFORT carbon fibre composite delivers a high strength and lightweight structure. Tanks can be equipped with the Omni Tanker seamless Mould in Baffle (MIB) technology which meets dangerous goods portable tank regulations allowing the tanks to operate at any fill level for added security and longevity. OmniTAINER™ is the revolutionary lighter, safer, and more durable transport tank for high purity and corrosive chemicals. Certifications · US DOT 49 CFR Special Permit - PHMSA · CSA B625 under Equivalency Certificate - Transport Canada · European ADR / RID - BAM · Australian ADG7 - NSW EPA · CSC - Lloyd's Register Deep Sea dangerous goods certification to be made available upon release of the IMO/IMDG Code Amendment 41-22, following the publication of UN Model Regulations for FRP Portable Tanks. *** End Text***
  1. OmniTAINER Swap Tanks:
3A: Under "OmniTAINER Swap Tanks": *** Start Text*** OmniTAINER Swap Tanks are constructed using the patented OmniTANK technology. These are the world's first carbon fibre reinforced swap tank containers, and are suitable for a broad range of chemicals. OmniTAINER Swap Tanks are suited to intermodal chemical transport throughout Europe. *** End Text*** 3B. Under "Read More" (shown in red box below), add the following text: *** Start Text *** The OmniTAINER™ Swap Tank is an intermodal tank container approved for road and rail transport of Dangerous Goods. It is available in a range of volumes from 27,000 to 31,000 litres. The OmniTAINER™ includes a specially developed fire protection system which has been tested at the BAM Test Site Technical Safety facility in Germany and passes the European ADR and RID full engulfment fire test requirements. OmniTAINER™ is currently approved with a test pressure of 4 bar. The OmniTAINER™ Swap Tank holds ADR, RID and CSC Approvals, and can be supplied as L4BH (bottom outlet) or L4DH (top discharge). OmniTAINER™ is suitable for transporting high purity chemicals such as Hydrogen Peroxide and Ammonium Hydroxide without contamination of these cargoes. They are also suitable for transport of aggressive corrosive Class 8 chemicals such as Sodium Hypochlorite, Hydrochloric Acid, Sulphuric Acid, Ferric Chloride, Ferrous Chloride, Hydrofluoric Acid, Hydrofluorosilisic Acid, Nitric Acid, and Phosphoric Acid without degradation of the liner. The OmniTAINER™ contains the highly engineered and patented composite material combination including the OmniSHIELD™, OmniBIND™ and OmniFORT™ product systems. The OmniSHIELD polyethylene interior is specifically designed to provide high chemical resistance to composite tanks and is a revolution in corrosion barrier technology, creating a seamless and low stress polymer interior. The OmniBIND overcomes challenges associated with joining thermoplastics to thermoset composites, providing a strong and durable connection. The OmniFORT carbon fibre composite delivers a high strength and lightweight structure. Tanks can be equipped with the Omni Tanker seamless Mould in Baffle (MIB) technology which meets dangerous goods tank regulations allowing the tanks to operate at any fill level for added security and longevity. OmniTAINER™ is the revolutionary lighter, safer, and more durable transport tank for high purity and corrosive chemicals. Certifications
  • European ADR / RID - Kiwa Inspecta
  • CSC - Lloyd's Register
*** End Text *** Best regards, Luke Djukic Dr Luke Djukic (PhD, BE, CPEng, FIEAust, NER, APEC Engineer, IntPE(Aus), RPEQ) Chief Technical Officer T: [url=+61%202%204647%207557]+61 (0) 2 4647 7557 M: [url=+61%202%204647%207557]+61 (0) 423 851 880

Hi Luke, 

We have added the new image in the Omni Tanker homepage.

Here's the link:
https://omnitanker.com/
